title: LF SUPPORT MAIN - CLIMBING RANKED
body:
Hey, Been struggling so far to climb the rough challenges of elo hell (Silver) So Im out looking for a genuine support main who would like to duo.
My Champion List varies when it comes to AD. But Flexible with Most AD's

**Contact Details & Information**
* Skype: umis.mc

* Rank S5: Silver 2
* IGN (OCE): Ehro
* Just add me if you are interested :)



**Preferred AD's**
{{champion:81}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:96}} {{champion:15}} {{champion:18}} {{champion:22}} {{champion:222}} 

**Flexible Pick's**
{{champion:29}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:42}} 

**Cant Play At All**
{{champion:236}} {{champion:51}} 

**Not Owned**
{{champion:110}} {{champion:133}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:202}} 

_Thanks :)!_

replies.body:
Hi!
I just added you. Maybe we can play when we get the time or something.
I am a support main, looking for a patient and nice adc 

I can only play 3 supp champs atm:
{{champion:37}}  {{champion:267}}  {{champion:40}} 


Need to practice:
{{champion:89}}  {{champion:99}} {{champion:16}} 

Sometimes i can make plays but i prefer my adc to tell me what to do such as when to ult, if he's ready etc. not to go too aggro, you know? the basics?
Just sometimes i get flamed and ends up dying because my adc doesnt follow up or he goes in without me xD

I cant really play tanky supports but im trying to learn them :)
Hey man I just moved to Oceania server from EUW as I've moved to Oz, Would you want to run a few normal games to see if we are compatible? Then I'll come back to you for ranked when I'm lvl 30?
